target.markdownDescription: Set the JavaScript language version for emitted JavaScript and include compatible library declarations..

jsx.markdownDescription: Specify what JSX code is generated..

preserveWatchOutput.markdownDescription: Disable wiping the console in watch mode.

pretty.markdownDescription: Enable color and formatting in TypeScript's output to make compiler errors easier to read.

noErrorTruncation.markdownDescription: Disable truncating types in error messages.

declaration.markdownDescription: Generate .d.ts files from TypeScript and JavaScript files in your project.

importHelpers.markdownDescription: Allow importing helper functions from tslib once per project, instead of including them per-file.

downlevelIteration.markdownDescription: Emit more compliant, but verbose and less performant JavaScript for iteration.

inlineSourceMap.markdownDescription: Include sourcemap files inside the emitted JavaScript.

inlineSources.markdownDescription: Include source code in the sourcemaps inside the emitted JavaScript.

stripInternal.markdownDescription: Disable emitting declarations that have @internal in their JSDoc comments.

noEmitHelpers.markdownDescription: Disable generating custom helper functions like __extends in compiled output.

preserveConstEnums.markdownDescription: Disable erasing const enum declarations in generated code.

preserveValueImports.markdownDescription: Preserve unused imported values in the JavaScript output that would otherwise be removed.

isolatedModules.markdownDescription: Ensure that each file can be safely transpiled without relying on other imports.

allowSyntheticDefaultImports.markdownDescription: Allow 'import x from y' when a module doesn't have a default export.

esModuleInterop.markdownDescription: Emit additional JavaScript to ease support for importing CommonJS modules. This enables allowSyntheticDefaultImports for type compatibility.

noImplicitAny.markdownDescription: Enable error reporting for expressions and declarations with an implied any type..

strictNullChecks.markdownDescription: When type checking, take into account null and undefined.

strictFunctionTypes.markdownDescription: When assigning functions, check to ensure parameters and the return values are subtype-compatible.

strictBindCallApply.markdownDescription: Check that the arguments for bind, call, and apply methods match the original function.

strictPropertyInitialization.markdownDescription: Check for class properties that are declared but not set in the constructor.

noImplicitThis.markdownDescription: Enable error reporting when this is given the type any.

useUnknownInCatchVariables.markdownDescription: Default catch clause variables as unknown instead of any.

noUnusedLocals.markdownDescription: Enable error reporting when a local variables aren't read.

noUnusedParameters.markdownDescription: Raise an error when a function parameter isn't read.

exactOptionalPropertyTypes.markdownDescription: Differentiate between undefined and not present when type checking.

noImplicitReturns.markdownDescription: Enable error reporting for codepaths that do not explicitly return in a function.

noFallthroughCasesInSwitch.markdownDescription: Enable error reporting for fallthrough cases in switch statements.

noUncheckedIndexedAccess.markdownDescription: Add undefined to a type when accessed using an index.

noImplicitOverride.markdownDescription: Ensure overriding members in derived classes are marked with an override modifier.

noPropertyAccessFromIndexSignature.markdownDescription: Enforces using indexed accessors for keys declared using an indexed type.

allowUnusedLabels.markdownDescription: Disable error reporting for unused labels.

allowUnreachableCode.markdownDescription: Disable error reporting for unreachable code.

allowUmdGlobalAccess.markdownDescription: Allow accessing UMD globals from modules.

experimentalDecorators.markdownDescription: Enable experimental support for TC39 stage 2 draft decorators.

emitDecoratorMetadata.markdownDescription: Emit design-type metadata for decorated declarations in source files.

noLib.markdownDescription: Disable including any library files, including the default lib.d.ts.

disableSourceOfProjectReferenceRedirect.markdownDescription: Disable preferring source files instead of declaration files when referencing composite projects.

noImplicitUseStrict.markdownDescription: Disable adding 'use strict' directives in emitted JavaScript files.

suppressExcessPropertyErrors.markdownDescription: Disable reporting of excess property errors during the creation of object literals.

suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors.markdownDescription: Suppress noImplicitAny errors when indexing objects that lack index signatures.

noStrictGenericChecks.markdownDescription: Disable strict checking of generic signatures in function types.

keyofStringsOnly.markdownDescription: Make keyof only return strings instead of string, numbers or symbols. Legacy option.
